description: This initiative focuses on transforming waste that typically ends up in landfills into valuable cleaning products. Founded in 2013, it aims to give a second life to materials, particularly from the beauty and food industries. By collaborating with major clients, the initiative not only addresses waste management but also contributes to carbon credit systems. The company emphasizes innovation and community impact, employing local workers and offering flexible opportunities for education. Their business model promotes a circular economy, striving to reduce waste while creating sustainable products for consumers.
name: RVA
